title: Week 10 Picks Against the Spread, Best Bets, Gambling Advice (Football 11/8)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Pete Prisco and R.J. White for Week 10 gambling advice, covering all 12 games on Sunday and Monday. The guys discuss Bills-Browns (7:10), Vikings-Cowboys (12:00), Chiefs-Titans (16:40), Cardinals-Bucs (20:55), Rams-Steelers (24:30), Falcons-Saints (28:10), Dolphins-Colts (32:00), Giants-Jets (39:45), Ravens-Bengals (43:50), Panthers-Packers (47:15), Lions-Bears (50:30) and Seahawks-49ers (53:40).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
